message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start
I think a 65-35 split is a bit more fair. Let's start with this and see how the game progresses.
Considering the inflation, I think 58-42 is a more reasonable split now
Let's be reasonable here. With the inflation, a 60-40 split is still a fair deal. This will give us both a decent amount and we can avoid ending up with nothing.
Come on, Bob, inflation is hitting you harder. 56-44 is the most I can offer now
